amendment.description: Amendment provides $1.5 million for the National Agri-Tourism Initiative under the USDA Rural Community Advancement Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to direct attention to funding levels for Rural Community Advancement Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Sanders.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
